nodes.text: Emergency condition 292 was a security condition which could be issued by Galactic Republic forces on the prison planet of Belsavis in case of a breakout. Around 3641 BBY, the traitorous Child of the Emperor, S. Geland, declared the emergency condition when trying to stop the Barsen'thor of the Jedi Order from reaching the imprisoned Esh-kha Hallow Voice. In response to S. Geland's orders, two battle droids arrived at the scene to assist Geland, but the Barsen'thor defeated them and the commander.
